body:
this is a copy of PR #26380 which I cannot re-open.
reporting here PR description. sorry for the troubles..

------------------------------
#### PR description:

this PR implements a more realistic version of the HGC HE-back digitizer:
- updated parameters, closer to the current design of the HGC HE-back section, are included
- switches are added to choose the digi algorithm and enable the dependence of the signal on the scintillator tile geometry
- a first implementation of a end-of-life scenario (3000/fb, 16.7kh) for HGC HE-back is implemented. the scenario is automatically enabled when the appropriate custom function defined in `aging.py` is called
- a standalone analyzer is added to allow a simplified plotting of the dose, fluence and SoN maps

the references that support this implementation are:
- [Notes from Philippe (mid 2018)](https://deguio.web.cern.ch/deguio/hgcal/docs/Note_area.pdf)
- [DN from Jeremy/Pawel (early 2017)](cms.cern.ch/iCMS/jsp/openfile.jsp?tp=draft&files=DN2017_010_v1.pdf)
- [Notes from Chris (early 2019)](https://deguio.web.cern.ch/deguio/hgcal/docs/ElectronicsNotes.pdf)
- [Dose and Fluence parametrization by Jeremy (April 2019)](https://deguio.web.cern.ch/deguio/hgcal/docs/scintillator-fits.pdf)
- CMS-TDR-019

This set of changes will allow to study the evolution of occupancy and bandwidth for a end-of-life configuration of the HGC scintillating section.


#### PR validation:

A full validation was presented at the [HGCal DPG](https://indico.cern.ch/event/810242/#2-simulation-of-scintsipms)

in summary:
- small differences are expected for a non-aged scenario
- an improved description of the signal and noise evolution is included depending from cell location, scintillator darkening and dark current for a end-of-life scenario
- the implementation is not expected to affect dramatically the recHit energy scale

in terms of performance here is the impact of this PR on the HGC HE-back digitization:
- [current version](http://deguio.web.cern.ch/deguio/cgi-bin/igprof-navigator/HGCalDigi/outputAlgo1.pp/105)
- [new implementation, begin of life](http://deguio.web.cern.ch/deguio/cgi-bin/igprof-navigator/HGCalDigi/outputAlgo2.pp/116)
- [new implementation, end of life](http://deguio.web.cern.ch/deguio/cgi-bin/igprof-navigator/HGCalDigi/outputAlgo2_3000_geom.pp/31)
- [new implementation, end of life, after commit 4a52c5eb25d](http://deguio.web.cern.ch/deguio/cgi-bin/igprof-navigator/HGCalDigi/outputAlgo2_3000_geom.4a52c5eb25d.pp/33)
- [new implementation, end of life, after commit dc5acc22b2b](http://deguio.web.cern.ch/deguio/cgi-bin/igprof-navigator/HGCalDigi/outputAlgo2_3000_geom.dc5acc22b2b.pp/55)
- [new implementation, v10 on 10_6_0_pre4, end of life, after commit 5c42c3cad85](http://deguio.web.cern.ch/deguio/cgi-bin/igprof-navigator/HGCalDigi/outputAlgo2_3000_geom.5c42c3cad85.pp/63)
